items.sentence: The police found Tom\'s blood on Mary\'s shoes.
It wasn\'t hard to convince Tom not to do that.
It won\'t be as boring to do that as you think.
It\'s easy to forget that the microphone is on.
I\'ve never tasted anything as unusual as this.
I\'ve never wanted anything so much in my life.
I\'ve only spoken to Tom once since I got here.
Tom intervened in his coworkers\' disagreement.
Tom is a bit busy, so he can\'t help you today.
I should call the police and have you arrested.
I sometimes feel drowsy in the early afternoon.
I sometimes hear my father singing in the bath.
I spent yesterday reading instead of going out.
I stayed home all day instead of going to work.
Tom must\'ve had a good reason for what he did.
Tom never said anything about where he\'d been.
Tom never should\'ve let Mary out of his sight.
Tom noticed the wedding ring on Mary\'s finger.
Is there anyone who doesn\'t have one of these?
Is this the first time you\'ve seen this movie?
